title: List of Manchester City F.C. seasons
summary: Manchester City Football Club is an English professional association football club based in Manchester, that currently plays in the Premier League. The list covers the period from 1891 (when the club, then known as Ardwick, joined the Football Alliance) to the present day. It details the club's achievements in senior league and cup competitions, and the top scorers for each season. The club was renamed Manchester City F.C in 1894, and moved to Maine Road in 1923. Since 2003 the club has played at the City of Manchester Stadium. Manchester City's biggest rivals are Manchester United; they compete against each other in the Manchester derby.
